title: Blended Learning Curriculum for Sustaining Cardiac POCUS Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and foundational principles of ultrasound examination
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Program Combining Online Theory and Face-to-Face Practice for Acquiring Medical Ultrasound Techniques

learning_goals: Independently acquire the five fundamental cardiac POCUS views (apical long-axis, parasternal short-axis, apical four-chamber, subcostal four-chamber, and subcostal inferior vena cava)
Demonstrate an improvement of at least 2 points in image acquisition scores (out of 10) at the 8-week follow-up evaluation
Perform self-assessment using a 10-point scale for evaluating echocardiographic image quality

resources: ASE (Academic and Scientific Excellence) Online Module

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
